title: Lunchly
desc:
Post 2330
- Draw 2 cards and get **Injured** when eaten, a <:colorless:1106434944261177374> **Mr. Beeeeeeeeast** (132) is put on the deck as the 25~35th next card to be drawn, you know where it is at all times.
- When played or eaten, gain the alternative win condition of: Cure 1000 blind people.
